author: Charles H Baker
description: A frappé version of the Classic Champagne Cocktail which is given extra interest courtesy of a Chartreuse float.
name: Jimmie Roosevelt
recipeIngredient: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)
75 ml Brut champagne or sparkling wine

recipeInstructions.text: Soak sugar cube with Angostura and drop into base of glass
POUR cognac, sugar syrup and champagne over soaked cube
Fill glass with cracked (not crushed) ice and finish with a FLOAT of Chartreuse
